name: Spirits of Vengeance
description:
STORY:

Take the role of an unnamed warrior on the path for revenge against those who killed everyone in your village. Battle your way through waves of increasingly difficult enemies with 2D hack n’ slash combat and some help from those you lost.

An arena action game made for Brackeys Jam 2022.2.

CONTROLS:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move
Space - Attack
Shift - Dash

Alternate control (keyboard controls recommended)
Left Click - Attack
Right Click - Dash
